entry.title: Yellow Paper Daisy
entry.summary:
Author: Babysterek

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 39,310Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 95

Summary: ‚ÄúWell,‚Äù Peter says at last, forcing a crooked smile into his voice, ‚Äúat least this time he didn‚Äôt almost get us all killed.‚ÄùDerek swallows. His throat is dry, the words scraping on the way out. ‚ÄúI was drunk.‚Äù They land and disappear without effect. Talia turns then, her gaze settling on him fully. It‚Äôs steady, unreadable, and it makes his shoulders tense despite himself. ‚ÄúYou were careless,‚Äù she says. ‚ÄúYou are a werewolf, and if you got drunk, you laced it with wolfsbane, you did it. Do you understand, In twenty-four years, every scandal has had the same root. You. At some point, it stops being bad luck and becomes character. And I am tired of pretending this is something that merely happens to you.‚Äù --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Derek just wanted a moment of quiet. Instead, he crosses a line with the last person he should trust.....old grudges, bad decisions and a mistake he keeps repeating. "He learned the shape of the poison once, from a woman who wore it like skin. Now hemlock blooms in his own hands, and he cannot tell where she ends and he begins. "

entry.title: A Flower Made Of Iron
entry.summary:
Author: XOLissy

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 979,551Chapters: 34/?Kudos: 51

Summary: Eden Parker has learned how to survive by staying soft in a world that punishes it. Adopted young, raised in the quiet fractures of Mystic Falls, and carrying truths no one else can see, Eden moves through life balancing grief, loyalty, and a dangerous kind of hope. He loves deeply. He trusts carefully. And he has no idea how many forces‚Äîhuman and otherwise‚Äîare already watching him. When new friendships form, old wounds reopen, and the supernatural begins to bleed into the ordinary, Eden finds himself at the center of something far larger than a high-school existence should allow. Monsters lurk in forests and shadows. Love arrives when it shouldn‚Äôt. Protection becomes complicated. And the past‚Äîburied, sealed, and forgotten‚Äîrefuses to stay quiet. Some bonds are chosen. Some are fated. And some are forged in pain, blood, and devotion. Disclaimer: I do not own the Vampire Diaries, Supernatural, Teen Wolf, Smallville, or The Originals. I do not own any of the characters besides Eden Parker and Ben Monroe. All rights reserved to the writers.

entry.title: Time Travel's a Bitch
entry.summary:
Author: wildimaginingsofhalfbakedideas

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 57,245Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 3,924

Summary: A wolf howled, long and mournful. Stiles looked around, his breath coming in visible puffs on the frosty air as he searched for fur and fangs and sad eyes, but he saw only the swaying green limbs of evergreen trees in the wind. Snow started to fall and he looked up at the white sky, blinking, before he fell backwards to land softly on a familiar bed. He blinked again and the soft white of the sky solidified into his bedroom ceiling with its neon green glow in the dark stars. He watched as a nebula formed in the space between his outstretched hand and the plastic stars, mesmerized as it roiled and burned in fast forward to birth a star, a real one, right into his bedroom. The star burned white hot against his skin, so bright and painful that his nerves couldn‚Äôt compute. He twisted away desperately, crying out. A dark skinned man in the corner watched calmly as he writhed and said, ‚ÄúWe begin in the dark, and birth is the death of us.‚Äù Stiles screamed as the fire sunk into his skin, his soul, and fell once more into the darkness.//Stiles ends up in 2004, before the Hale fire, and learns a lot about himself, life, and what it means to hold onto what you love and not let go.

Author: ya3ani

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,705Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 50

entry.title: Just Trust Me, You'll Be Fine
entry.summary:
Author: PigeonTheSmol

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,405Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 110

Summary: The events of Season 1 of The Pitt go the same as they do in the show, but when Dennis gets to Trinity's place there's an additional roommate. Stiles and Dennis become fast friends but both are hiding secrets about why they keep avoiding talking about home. One day a man comes into The Pitt with a bullet lodged into his side and when they check his emergency contact, it's Stiles. But what's more concerning to Dennis is that he recognises the bullet. entry.title: Time After Time
entry.summary:
Author: anarchycox

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,510Chapters: 2/6Kudos: 290

Summary: Talia told Noah about werewolves and the supernatural when he was elected Sheriff. He warned her that was a mistake and she didn't understand why, until she realized that that meant ten year old Stiles knew about werewolves. God help them all.A soft and slow burn story about the five times the Stilinskis saved the Hales over the years, and the one time they were saved right back.
